name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein single player
body: The purpose of this repository is to provide source code for Return to Castle Wolfenstein single player game DLLs, with minor fixes for 64 bit systems. It's primarily ment to be used with JLQuake. There are no plans to do any further work on this.
tagline: Return to Castle Wolfenstein Single Player game source
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
